channel.title: Cloud on StatPREP Workshops 2019
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on StatPREP Workshops 2019

item.title: Introduction to RStudio.cloud
item.description: Background Setup your account on RStudio Cloud Running Little Apps IN DRAFT: Make a link to the RStudio webinar on Wednesday about cloud. Background The GAISE report’s Recommendation 5 is Use technology to explore concepts and analyze data. Elaborations on this recommendation are contained in Appendix D of the report, and include interactive applets, pp. 66-75 I think of these as a mouse-driven form of computation that requires absolutely no “coding” statistical software.
